void out ( char  port,
int  pin,
_Bool  value 
)

Turn a pin on the given port on or off (or in reality, switch it from sourceing to sinking current)

Parameters:
port char - Which port is the pin on? (ie: 'B' or 'D')
pin int - Which pin is set to source or sink current
value _Bool - Whether the pin is sourcing or sinking current
Returns:
void Returns nothing
